TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualPathProvider extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public MustInherit Class VirtualPathProvider Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class VirtualPathProvider abstract : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 提供可讓 Web 應用程式從虛擬檔案系統擷取資源的方法集。

span.span: Provides a set of methods that enable a Web application to retrieve resources from a virtual file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組實作 Web 應用程式的虛擬檔案系統的方法。The class provides a set of methods for implementing a virtual file system for a Web application. 在虛擬檔案系統中，檔案和目錄是由以外的伺服器作業系統所提供的檔案系統的資料存放區管理。In a virtual file system, the files and directories are managed by a data store other than the file system provided by the server's operating system. 例如，您可以使用虛擬檔案系統內容儲存在 SQL Server 資料庫。For example, you can use a virtual file system to store content in a SQL Server database. 虛擬檔案系統中，您可以在要求上儲存已處理的任何檔案。You can store any file that is processed on request in a virtual file system. 包括：This includes: - ASP.NET 網頁、 主版頁面、 使用者控制項和其他物件。ASP.NET pages, master pages, user controls, and other objects. - 副檔名為.jpg.htm 等的標準網頁。Standard Web pages with extensions such as .htm and .jpg. - 任何自訂延伸模組對應至執行個體。Any custom extension mapped to a instance. - 在任何具名的主題`App_Theme`資料夾。Any named theme in the `App_Theme` folder. 您無法儲存 ASP.NET 應用程式資料夾或虛擬檔案系統中產生應用程式層級組件的檔案。You cannot store ASP.NET application folders or files that generate application-level assemblies in a virtual file system. 包括：This includes: - Global.asax 檔案中。The Global.asax file. - Web.config 檔案。Web.config files. - 站台所使用的對應資料檔案。Site map data files used by the . - 包含應用程式的組件，或產生應用程式組件的目錄： `Bin`， `App_Code`， `App_GlobalResources`，任何`App_LocalResources`。Directories that contain application assemblies or that generate application assemblies: `Bin`, `App_Code`, `App_GlobalResources`, any `App_LocalResources`. - 應用程式資料資料夾`App_Data`。The application data folder, `App_Data`. > [!NOTE] > 如果部署先行編譯網站時，所提供的內容就不會編譯執行個體，並沒有執行個體所使用的先行編譯的站台。If a Web site is precompiled for deployment, content provided by a instance is not compiled, and no instances are used by the precompiled site. ## 註冊 VirtualPathProviderRegistering a VirtualPathProvider 自訂執行個體應該使用 ASP.NET 編譯系統註冊使用任何頁面剖析或編譯會在 Web 應用程式執行之前的方法。A custom instance should be registered with the ASP.NET compilation system by using the method before any page parsing or compilation is performed by the Web application. 通常執行個體中註冊`AppInitialize`中所定義的方法`App_Code`目錄中，或在`Application_Start`中的事件`Global.asax`檔案。Typically, a instance is registered in an `AppInitialize` method defined in the `App_Code` directory, or during the `Application_Start` event in the `Global.asax` file. 如需註冊的範例執行個體中`AppInitialize`方法，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。For an example of registering a instance in an `AppInitialize` method, see the Example section. 您可以註冊期間其他事件，但頁面的執行個體編譯和快取之前執行個體註冊將不會失效，即使新執行個體現在會提供的來源先前已編譯的網頁。You can register a instance during other events, but pages compiled and cached before the instance is registered will not be invalidated, even if the new instance would now provide the source for the previously compiled page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立使用資訊儲存在虛擬檔案系統的類別實作物件。The following code example is a class implementation that creates a virtual file system using information stored in a object. 程式碼範例會使用的程式碼範例並類別來提供虛擬資源的資料存放區載入至物件。The code example works with the code examples for the and classes to provide virtual resources from a data store that is loaded into a object. 此範例包含四個部分：類別實作，用來填入 XML 資料檔物件，`AppStart`物件，其中包含`AppInitialize`方法用來註冊編譯類別系統和 ASP.NET 網頁，提供虛擬檔案的連結。This example has four parts: the class implementation, an XML data file used to populate the object, an `AppStart` object that contains an `AppInitialize` method used to register the class with the compilation system, and an ASP.NET page that provides links to the virtual files. 若要使用此範例程式碼應用程式中，請遵循下列步驟。To use this sample code in an application, follow these steps. 1. 在您的 Web 伺服器上建立範例應用程式。Create a sample application on your Web server. 2. 複製自訂的原始程式碼物件 （如下所示） 到應用程式的檔案`App_Code`目錄。Copy the source code for the custom object (see below) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 3. 複製自訂的原始程式碼物件 (請參閱中的範例 > 一節類別的概觀主題) 到應用程式的檔案`App_Code`目錄。Copy the source code for the custom object (see the Example section in the class overview topic) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 4. 複製自訂的原始程式碼物件 (請參閱中的範例 > 一節類別的概觀主題) 到應用程式的檔案`App_Code`目錄。Copy the source code for the custom object (see the Example section in the class overview topic) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 5. 複製的原始程式碼`AppStart`物件 （如下所示） 到應用程式的檔案`App_Code`目錄。Copy the source code for the `AppStart` object (see below) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 6. 將 XML 資料 （如下所示） 複製到名為的檔案`XMLData.xml`至應用程式的檔案`App_Data`目錄。Copy the XML data (see below) into a file named `XMLData.xml` into a file in the application's `App_Data` directory. 7. 複製`default.aspx`到範例應用程式根目錄的檔案 （如下所示）。Copy the `default.aspx` file (see below) into the root directory of the sample application. 使用網頁瀏覽器來開啟`default.aspx`檔案，然後再按一下 若要查看虛擬檔案的內容頁面上的連結。Use a Web browser to open the `default.aspx` file, and then click the links on the page to see the contents of the virtual files. 第一個範例是自訂類別。The first example is a custom class. 和表示要求的目錄是否存在於虛擬檔案系統中覆寫的方法。The and methods are overridden to indicate whether a requested directory is present in the virtual file system. 並方法會覆寫以傳回自訂和執行個體包含從虛擬檔案系統的資訊。The and methods are overridden to return custom and instances containing information from the virtual file system. 類別也會提供`GetVirtualData`所使用的方法並類別來存取物件，包含虛擬檔案系統資料。The class also provides a `GetVirtualData` method used by the and classes to access the object containing the virtual file system data. 在生產環境實作中，這個方法通常會實作負責與資料存放區互動的商務物件中。In a production implementation, this method would typically be implemented in a business object responsible for interacting with the data store. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#20)] 第二個範例是用來填入 XML 資料檔案傳回的自訂物件物件。The second example is the XML data file used to populate the object returned by the custom object. 此 XML 資料用來示範如何使用， ，和物件來擷取外部資料中的資料，並不是要代表的實際執行品質的資料存放區。This XML data is used to demonstrate using the , , and objects to retrieve data from external data and is not intended to represent a production-quality data store. ``` ``` 第三個範例會提供`AppStart`物件，其中包含`AppInitialize`方法。The third example provides an `AppStart` object that contains an `AppInitialize` method. ASP.NET 應用程式執行所需的任何自訂初始設定初始化期間，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called during the initialization of an ASP.NET application to perform any custom initialization required. 在此情況下，它會註冊自訂物件使用 ASP.NET 建置系統。In this case, it registers the custom object with the ASP.NET build system. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/AppStart.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/AppStart.vb#10)] 最後一個範例是 ASP.NET 網頁，其中包含虛擬檔案系統中所包含的虛擬檔案的連結。The last example is an ASP.NET page that contains links to the virtual files contained in the virtual file system. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

block.para:
當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員：
When you inherit from , you must override the following members:
-
- 如果您的自訂類別支援在虛擬檔案系統中的目錄，您必須覆寫下列成員。If your custom class supports directories in the virtual file system, you must override the following members.
-
-
如果您的虛擬檔案系統將會包含網站的佈景主題 (藉由建立的虛擬App_Themes目錄)，您的自訂類別必須支援的目錄。If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual App_Themes directory), your custom class must support directories.自訂類別會搭配使用衍生自類別和類別。A custom class works with classes derived from the and classes.您應該實作衍生的類別，從這些型別提供從您的虛擬檔案系統的檔案和目錄資訊。You should implement derived classes from these types to provide file and directory information from your virtual file system.如需自訂的範例實作中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For an example of a custom implementation, see the Example section of the class overview topic.如需自訂的範例實作中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For an example of a custom implementation, see the Example section of the class overview topic.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 此建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

span.span: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當覆寫建構函式，延遲之後必須進行任何初始化物件是否登錄至方法。When overriding the constructor, defer any initialization that must occur after the object is registered to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作建構函式，以初始化自訂類別。The following code example is an implementation of the constructor that initializes a custom class. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#25)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string CombineVirtualPaths (string basePath, string relativePath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CombineVirtualPaths(string basePath, string relativePath) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CombineVirtualPaths (basePath As String, relativePath As String) As String
public: virtual System::String ^ CombineVirtualPaths(System::String ^ basePath, System::String ^ relativePath);
abstract member CombineVirtualPaths : string * string -> string override this.CombineVirtualPaths : string * string -> string

span.span: The base path for the application.

param.name: relativePath
param.span: 虛擬資源的路徑，與基底路徑相對。

span.span: The path to the virtual resource, relative to the base path.

summary.span: 將基底路徑與相對路徑組合，以傳回虛擬資源的完整路徑。

span.span: Combines a base path with a relative path to return a complete path to a virtual resource.
The complete path to a virtual resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來檢查虛擬資源的相對路徑的內容，並執行所需的任何修改。Use the method to inspect the contents of a relative path to a virtual resource and perform any modifications required. 預設實作會結合`basePath`和`relativePath`參數根據標準的 ASP.NET 路徑處理。The default implementation combines the `basePath` and `relativePath` parameters according to standard ASP.NET path processing.

para.span: 如果您覆寫的預設實作方法中，您都必須將任何特殊的語法，與有效的虛擬路徑的參數。

span.span: If you override the default implementation of the method, you are required to convert any special syntax with the parameter to a valid virtual path.

para.span: 您負責語法檢查路徑驗證和處理不正確的輸入，以及為語式正確的輸入的邊緣案例。

span.span: You are responsible for syntax checking, path validation, and handling malformed input, as well as edge cases for well-formed input.

para.span: 在大部分情況下它不會覆寫預設必要方法。

span.span: In most cases it will not be necessary to override the default method.

para.span: 不過，如果您需要修改的路徑，我們建議您限制您實作，以修改您的虛擬路徑提供者中的特定權杖參數，而您再呼叫基底實作，以執行正常ASP.NET 路徑處理

span.span: However, if you do need to modify the path, we recommend that you limit your implementation to modifying tokens specific to your virtual path provider in the parameter, and that you then call the base implementation to perform normal ASP.NET path processing

span.span: The path to the virtual directory.

summary.span: 取得值，指出目錄是否存在於虛擬檔案系統中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a directory exists in the virtual file system.

returns.span: 如果目錄存在於虛擬檔案系統中則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the directory exists in the virtual file system; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，以表示編譯系統資源代表`virtualDir`存在於虛擬檔案系統，提供由這個執行個體。Override the method to indicate to the compilation system that the resource represented by `virtualDir` exists in the virtual file system provided by this instance. 如果您的自訂類別不支援目錄方法應傳回`false`。If your custom class does not support directories, the method should return `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的虛擬檔案系統將會包含網站的佈景主題 (藉由建立的虛擬`App_Themes`目錄)，您的自訂類別必須支援的目錄。If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual `App_Themes` directory), your custom class must support directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作方法，在自訂類別。The following code example is an implementation of the method in a custom class. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#22)]

param.name: virtualPathDependencies

summary.span: 基於指定的虛擬路徑建立快取相依性。

span.span: Creates a cache dependency based on the specified virtual paths.

returns.span: 指定虛擬資源的 物件。

span.span: A object for the specified virtual resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作方法會傳回`null`。The default implementation of the method returns `null`. 快取虛擬資源以供稍後使用必須覆寫其中一個方法或方法。To cache virtual resources for later use you must override either the method or the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作方法，自訂類別。The following code example implements the method for a custom class. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#28)]

span.span: The path to the virtual resource.

summary.span: 傳回用於指定虛擬路徑的快取索引鍵。

span.span: Returns a cache key to use for the specified virtual path.

returns.span: 指定虛擬資源的快取索引鍵。

span.span: A cache key for the specified virtual resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以提供虛擬資源的自訂快取索引鍵。Use the method to provide a custom cache key for virtual resources. 如果您不會覆寫虛擬路徑的方法，用於快取索引鍵。If you do not override the method, the virtual path is used for the cache key.

para.span: 只覆寫預設如果建立快取索引鍵為基礎的虛擬路徑的方法不適用於您的應用程式。

span.span: Only override the default method if creating a cache key based on the virtual path will not work for your application.

span.span: The path to the virtual directory.

span.span: Gets a virtual directory from the virtual file system.

returns.span: 類別的子類別，表示虛擬檔案系統中的目錄。

span.span: A descendent of the class that represents a directory in the virtual file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的子類別，其中包含的檔案和目錄中指定的目錄中包含`virtualDir`參數。The method returns a descendent of the class that contains the file and directories contained in the directory specified in the `virtualDir` parameter. 如果您的自訂類別不支援目錄方法應傳回`null`。If your custom class does not support directories, the method should return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的虛擬檔案系統將會包含網站的佈景主題 (藉由建立的虛擬`App_Themes`目錄)，您的自訂類別必須支援的目錄。If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual `App_Themes` directory), your custom class must support directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作方法，在自訂類別。The following code example is an implementation of the method in a custom class. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後使用 ASP.NET 編譯系統註冊的提供者會呼叫方法。The method is called after the provider is registered with the ASP.NET compilation system. 方法用來提供任何初始設定之後需要執行個體放入應用程式所佔用的環境。The method is used to provide any initialization required after the instance is placed into the environment the application occupies. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作方法，從應用程式的設定資料檔案的路徑執行個體。The following code example is an implementation of the method that sets the path to a data file from the application's instance. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. summary.span: 藉由防止建立使用期，為 物件提供無限的存留期。

span.span: Gives the object an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫其基底類別中的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它會一律傳回`null`，並藉此避免建立會限制的使用期物件的存留期。It always returns `null` and thereby prevents a lease from being created that would limit the object's lifetime.

summary.span: 取得編譯系統中先前註冊 物件的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to a previously registered object in the compilation system.

value.span: 編譯系統中的下一個 物件。

span.span: The next object in the compilation system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當向 ASP.NET 編譯系統註冊物件，它會新增至提供者的鏈結。When a object is registered with the ASP.NET compilation system, it is added to a chain of providers. 使用屬性來手動處理關閉先前物件的鏈結中，如果要求的路徑不由這提供執行個體。Use the property to hand processing off to the previous object in the chain if the requested path is not provided by this instance. 路徑提供者的鏈結的結尾一律使用預設 ASP.NET 提供者，可從檔案系統的檔案。The chain of path providers always ends with the default ASP.NET provider, which serves files from the file system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是實作方法。The following code example is an implementation of the method. 如果要求的虛擬目錄不是以字串`"/vrdir"`，此方法會使用屬性，將要求傳遞至下一個鏈結中的物件。If the requested virtual directory does not begin with the string `"/vrdir"`, the method uses the property to pass the request to the next object in the chain. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#23)]
